intro.description: This cheat sheet is a step-by-step description of how to create a basic ArchiMate model.

item.title: Open the Model Tree
item.description: In order to see the model in the Model Tree, make sure the Model Tree Window is visible.

item.title: Add a New Model
item.description: Add a new Model by clicking the "New Empty Model" button on the toolbar or by right-clicking in the Model Tree Window and selecting "New Empty Model".

item.title: Add Elements to the Model
item.description:
You should now see the basic folder structure of your new model in the Model Tree. Also, you should see the Model Diagram Window open. This is where you can visually build your Model by dragging elements and connections from the palette to the diagram.
You can also add elements directly to the Model Tree by right-clicking on a folder and selecting the "New" menu action. Once added, the elements can be dragged from the Tree to the Diagram.
